journey.start_of_journey: My interest in IT began in high school, where I was fascinated by how technology works. I decided to pursue a degree in IT to deepen my understanding and skills.

milestones.description: Completed a major project in network security during my second year.
Interned with a leading tech company, gaining hands-on experience in cloud computing.

challenges.description: Struggled with advanced algorithms in the third year.
challenges.solution: Participated in study groups and sought help from professors to improve my understanding.

skills.name: Cloud Computing
skills.details: Gained experience with AWS and Azure through coursework and internships.

skills.name: Cybersecurity
skills.details: Developed skills in threat detection and prevention through various projects.

journey.future_aspirations: I aim to specialize in cloud architecture and cybersecurity, working on innovative solutions to protect and optimize digital environments.
